DOC.brief_title: The Effect Mobilization With Movement Pain Function Among Patients With Knee Osteoarthritis
DOC.detailed_description: Participants : A power analysis perform use G*Power 3.1 ( F test , analysis variance [ ANOVA ] : repeat measure , within-between interaction , priori : compute required sample size ) . A result 16 patient ( treatment group = 8 sham group = 8 ) use calculate effect size ( ES ) 0.27 pressure pain threshold knee intervention group . The power estimate ANOVA two group significance 0.05 revealed total sample size 27 patient necessary obtain power 0.80 . Considering 20 % attrition rate , minimum 18 patient need recruit first phase study . Patients knee OA attend King Fahd Hospital University recruit study . Patients diagnose orthopedic clinic refer Department Physiotherapy . Patients willing participate study screen eligibility Ethical consideration : The study approve Institutional Review Board ( IRB ) University Dammam ( IRB Number : IRB-2014-04-323 ) . Eligible individual study inform risk benefit ask read sign write consent form . Participant confidentiality maintain use code instead participant 's name data collection form . All data collection form save file secure locker . Only researcher supervisor key open locker . Statistical Analysis : Data analyze use International Business Machines ( IBM ) Statistical Package Social Sciences ( SPSS ) windows ( version 20.0 ) , significance level set p < 0.05 . In phase 1 , patient characteristic group baseline analyze use independent t-test . One way ANOVA repeat measure use analyze difference parametric data , Bonferroni adjustment use compare main effect . Post-hoc test perform reveal difference within- group time ( baseline , immediately post intervention , 2 day intervention ) . For Likert-scale WOMAC , Mann-Whitney U test use investigate between-group analysis . Whereas , Wilcoxon test use within-group analysis . Further analysis reveal correlation outcome measure investigate use Pearson Correlation test . In phase 2 , group match age , gender , BMI . The related t-test use investigate difference group .
DOC.criteria: Had unilateral bilateral knee OA Knee OA K & L grade ≥ 2 VAS = 3 cm previous 24 hour Able walk ≥ 6meter distance without aid Had knee lower limb surgery Oral corticosteroid use ( current\ 4 week ) Altered sensation around knee shoulder Exhibited cognitive difficulty Intraarticular corticosteroid hyaluronic acid injection within 6 month Had leg sciatica Contraindication manual therapy
